## Installation

You can install the development version of isotope from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("JohanLassen/isotopes")
```

## Example

After installing you just need to load the package and run the function `run_app()`` without any arguments:

``` r
library(isotope)
run_app()
```
